I want to go back to that time again.
I want to be small again.
Please, I really want to do it.
So, please let me stay with you.
On that day, you fainted at the sound of thunder.
Then, you woke up finding yourself small.
If I do the same thing here again...
So, it is impossible after all.
I am a fool after all.
Dad, Mom, Asuka, how are you doing?
I am doing fine here... in T-Tokyo...
They will know you are lying right away.
Okay then, I am shooting one more time.
Dad, Mom, Asuka, how are you doing?
I am doing fine in Tokyo.
I know you are worried about me, but I am fine.
I will send you another video some time.
It is been almost a week since my body became strange like this.
There is no sign of me getting back to normal.
They will not know it is from Minami-kun even if you send it from there, right?
I got a free email address that is different from mine.
I had stopped talking to Minami-kun before I knew it although I used to love him when we were kids.
I thought we would be like this forever.
Okay then, why do not you input your dad's address?
But, it was Minami-kun who found me when I had become like this.
It is more difficult than I expected.
I cannot show what I look like now to my family or friends.
So, I am living together with Minami-kun, which is quite fascinating.

Because of Chiyomi, we are worn out and look older.
I know you are worried about me, but I am fine.
I will send you another video some time.
Did she have these kinds of clothes?
She has not said anything we want to know.
Well, you are right, but are not we happy just to see that she is doing okay?
Why does not she just call us instead of doing annoying thing like this?
Well, maybe she cannot call us because she is scared of you two.
You are the one who hit her.
Well, it is kind of getting longer.
The organizer has an artistic temperament, you know...
Gosh. - Hey, give it to me.
I want to focus on the dance,
so I will not have it fixed and will endure loneliness.
Why are you talking like a trainee monk?
Oh, I will be running out of 10 yen coins.
It is going to run out.
How can you tell a lie like that?
But, I cannot possibly tell them the truth.
I cannot let them see how I am now.
I am still weak after getting sick.
Do not vent your anger on me.
I did not vent my anger...
He was sick in bed with fever yesterday.
You are causing me such trouble.
He is talking in his sleep?
So, Horikiri-san is the only one absent.
You have to prepare for the college entrance exam.
Take care of your health, okay?
Her parents called me and said that she is still in Tokyo.
Amippe, why do not you eat this?
Ah, I think I heard Horikiri-shi's voice.
What is the matter with Minami?
- He did not have to get so mad.
Why do I have to do that?
So, I am not asking you to come back to the kendo club.
I have quit the kendo club already, you know.
Without him, we will not have enough people to participate in the competition.
Then, you do not have to participate in it.
We are fighting against Awa-Higashi High School.
Every year, freshmen join our club after watching the matches.
If no freshmen joined us this year, the kendo club would be abolished.
The kendo club with a long history at Tateyama Daiichi High School would dissapper.
And, Awa-Higashi got a transfer student who finished 5th in the national competition last year.
We cannot beat him, but you might be able to win.
Even if you do not, you might have a good match with him.
If there was someone else, I would not be asking you.
I made up my mind to enter a med school right after graduation.
I will not have time to participate in it.
We are best friends, are not we?
I will be waiting for you.
My Little Lover: Minami Kun No Koibito
You would normally gobble it up.
Every morning, you wake up early and go for a run.
Then you practice swings, do not you?
That is to build up my stamina.
I will not be able to survive the college entrance exams without it.
Why do not you participate in the match?
Yabuki-kun is your best friend, is not he?
He is just saying it himself.
I do not think you would fail the exam just by participating in the match for just one day.
I know you want to do kendo.
You are itching to do it!
Are you scared, by any chance?
You just do not want to find yourself being defeated by the opponent.
It is okay to be defeated.
You have not practiced kendo for a while.
It will not be uncool even if you were defeated because you have done your best on what you like.
Umm... I did not mean it...
You cannot do anything without me.
You often eat alone on the rooftop, do not you?
Then, I will eat with you here from now on.
I will not be able to eat if you do that.
By any chance, do you have someone else in mind?
That is not the case, but...
Did Horikiri-san really go to Tokyo?
Why are you asking me such a question?
Can I see you after school today?

If they want to study, they can go to the library.
You do not have to answer it?
It is been ringing several times.
To hide it, you had a fake cough like that.
Do you want to eat something?
Why does she have to ask such a thing?
That is a taboo question to ask Minami-kun.
He got a lover and left us.
I do not consider him as my dad.
Why are you telling that to her with no hesitation?
The one who gave birth to me left us, too.
I do not consider her my mom.
It seems as if they understand each other without words.
Oh, you have never kissed before?
May I reserve here as well?
My Little Lover: Minami Kun No Koibito
How can you not know how I feel?
He got a lover and left us.
I do not consider him as my dad.
Your dad influenced you to start kendo, right?
What are you saying, all of a sudden?
Even now, you practice swings every day even though you quit kendo for the college entrance exam.
Is it because you want to somehow stay connected with your dad who left you?
You used to love your dad, and you might still...
I have forgotten about him already.
I do not even think about him.
Because you have changed so much since then.
My dad deserted and left my mom and grandma.
I had to protect those two who got abandoned.
You could not possibly understand it.
I have always wanted to be of help to you.
I will be a doctor no matter what and give my mom and grandma a comfortable life.
I do not need help from anyone.
So, I do not have time to spend on club activities or a superficial friendship.
the real reason why you will not participate in the match, huh?
- You were up? - I could not sleep for some reason.
You have been studying till this late?
Can I ask you a question?
you do not have a grudge against him?
That guy... who is my father.
I think there was a time I did.
Every day I have lived with all my might.
So, I had no time to have a grudge or anything.
Of course I have had a hard time after he left me,
but I would not have met you if I had not gotten married to Noboru-chan.
I would not be living with your grandma like this, either.
So, that evens things up, you know.
I have a cute son like this,
You are my most beloved son.
Young man, grow quickly and become 20.
You got drunk with such little alcohol?
Well, I guess I have to drink with you.
Okay, let me offer you a drink now.

but he said he would do it, for some reason.

'senpo,''jiho,''chuken' and'fukusho' all lost, (kendo terms that describe an order of team members to fight)
we are losing, that is for sure.

Instead of saying such rubbish, cheer on Minami-kun.

That izumi... he was so strong.
I am glad I got injured.

it is warm, and you can always hear the sound of the beloved one's heart beat.

Well, I just thought I would like to
